    • DisplayMenu

      public static void DisplayMenu(boolean cartMenu, List<String> stringList, List<MainApp.Product> productList, String type)
      Displays a reusable menu, which is used to display Products and the Cart
      Parameters:
      cartMenu - Boolean that keeps track whether this menu is for the Cart or Products
      stringList - List that holds the database of menu
      productList - List that gets produced from stringList
      type - For Products only, it is the type of category that the User is entering

    • UpdateTopString

      public static void UpdateTopString(boolean cartR, String type)
      Updates the string that gets displayed above the menus
      Parameters:
      cartR - Boolean to check if it is the cart or not
      type - For Products only, it is the type of category that the User is entering
